transcript:
[[A boy sits in a barrel which is floating in an ocean.]]
Boy: I wonder where I'll float next?
[[The barrel drifts into the distance. Nothing else can be seen.]]
{{Alt: Don't we all.}}
title: Barrel - Part 1

transcript:
[[Two trees are growing on opposite sides of a sphere.]]
{{Alt-title: 'Petit' being a reference to Le Petit Prince, which I only thought about halfway through the sketch}}
alt_text: 'Petit' being a reference to Le Petit Prince, which I only thought about halfway through the sketch
title: Petit Trees (sketch)

transcript:
[[A sketch of a landscape with sun on the horizon]]
{{Alt: There's a river flowing through the ocean}}
alt_text: There's a river flowing through the ocean
title: Landscape (sketch)

transcript:
[[A black number 70 sees a red package.]]
70: hey, a package!
[[The package explodes with a <<BOOM>> and a red cloud of smoke.]]
[[There are a red 7, a green 5 and a blue 2 lying near a scorched mark on the floor.]]
{{alt text: Blown into prime factors}}
title: Blown apart
